name: 深度阅读
description: 适合长文的深度阅读风格

styles.container: max-width: 680px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 14px 12px 32px 12px; font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "SF Pro Text", "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; line-height: 1.75 !important; color: #1a1a1a !important; background-color: #fff !important; word-wrap: break-word; letter-spacing: 0.01em;

h1.base: font-size: 32px; font-weight: 700; color: #0a0a0a !important; line-height: 1.2 !important; margin: 48px 0 24px; letter-spacing: -0.02em;

h2.base: font-size: 28px; font-weight: 700; color: #0a0a0a !important; line-height: 1.3 !important; margin: 40px 0 20px; letter-spacing: -0.01em;

code.block: margin: 32px 0; padding: 24px; background-color: #f6f8fa !important; border-radius: 8px; overflow-x: auto; line-height: 1.6 !important; border: 1px solid #e1e4e8;
code.inline: font-family: "SF Mono", Consolas, Monaco, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 16px; padding: 2px 6px; background-color: #f5f5f5 !important; color: #d73a49 !important; border-radius: 3px;

styles.quote: margin: 24px 0; padding: 14px 20px; background-color: #f8f9fa !important; border-left: 4px solid #0a0a0a; color: #1a1a1a !important; font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.6 !important; font-style: normal;
styles.image: max-width: 100%; max-height: 600px !important; height: auto; display: block; margin: 32px auto; border-radius: 8px;

table.header: background-color: #f6f8fa !important; padding: 12px 16px; text-align: left; border: 1px solid #e1e4e8; font-weight: 600; color: #1a1a1a !important;
